type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Shapeshifter Lord Noble
rules_text:
Trample
[i]Dragon Vein [/i]– Whenever Corrin, Resonating Blade enters or attacks, choose two. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target player creates two tapped Treasure tokens.
• Target player draws two cards, then discards a card.
• Target player creates two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Target player gains 5 life.
